name: Suburban Survival
description:
Hello and thank you for stopping by! This short prototype has you running around a dark town at night, eradicating zombies down to the last! Feedback is always much appreciated and very welcome!

Credit to Synty Studios for all their AMAZING assets! 

Credit to the following individuals for their audio assets! All were sourced from Freesound.org.

"Chewing, Carrot, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Zombie Moan" by gneube (https://freesound.org/people/gneube/sounds/315845/)

"Zombie_Thrown" by MisterKidX (https://freesound.org/people/MisterKidX/sounds/454840/)

"Horror Background Music" by Migfus20 (https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/sounds/560439/)

"DoorCreaking" by mikaelfernstrom (https://freesound.org/people/mikaelfernstrom/sounds/68682/)
